channel.title: Ofertas Diarias de Audio Plugin Guy (2026-01-19)

item.title: [FREEBIE] [SAVE BIG] [HOT] Waves|Waves has released Curves Resolve, a plugin for Win & Mac that intelligently resolves sonic masking issues. The plugin is available for free for the next 48 hours only.?ENDSSOON!?NEW
[FREEBIE] [SAVE BIG] Ocean Swift Synthesis|Get Wavetable Creator by Ocean Swift Synthesis for free (Normally $42).?NEW
